content: 6 cast on 5 5 5 sts at the beginning of the next 2 row for front bands - 56 sts all sizes raglan shaping - yoke row 1 all sizes place markers before and after each of 4 raglan seams as follows k13 front sts yo pm k2 pm yo k2 sleeve sts yo pm k2 pm yo k18 back sts yo pm k2 pm yo k2 sleeve sts yo pm k2 pm yo k13 front sts the markers show the placement of 4 seams each a set of 2 sts you will be increasing using *yo* on both sides of this seam every 3rd row for the raglan shaping 8 sts increased every 3rd row continue to slip the markers and discontinue using them when no longer needed to see where your seams are row 2 buttonhole k2 yo k2tog knit across slipping markers row 3 knit across slipping markers row 4 *knit to marker yo sm k2 sm yo repeat from *3 more times knit to end row 5 & 6 knit across slipping markers repeat row 4-6 continue increasing in this manner every 3 row 10 12 13 times more for a total of 12 14 15 increase row end by working row 6 each seam will have 12 14 15 holes followed by 2 knit row you should now have 152 168 176 stitches simply elegant timeless classics vintage appeal & heirloom quality garter stitch baby jacket top down - no sew - knitting for profit friendly divide to work body & sleeves separately ** if you wish to work the sleeves flat please knit the sleeve sts first and put the body sts on a holder see ** on next page no sewing method body next row remove markers as you come to them knit 26 28 29 sts for left front you will be knitting to the center of the raglan seam cast on 4 4 6 sts slip next 28 32 34 sleeve sts to a holder or length of scrap yarn knit 44 48 50 back sts cast on 4 4 6 sts slip next 28 32 34 sleeve sts to a holder knit 26 28 29 right front sts you should now have sleeves on holders and 104 112 120 body sts on your needle knit in garter st until work measures 4 75 5 25 5 75 12 13 5 14 5 cm from armhole cast off using stretchy cast off see illustrated instructions on next page sleeves using your set of 4 or 5 dp needles slip the sts for one sleeve onto the needles divided pick up and knit 6 4 4 sts in the cast on for the underarm 34 36 38 sts on needles divide evenly and mark the center of underarm for end of round working in rounds continue in garter st knit 1 row purl 1 row this time as we are working circular until sleeve measures 6 6 5 7 15 16
